special_text:
[i](Choose only one page as a sorcery to add its effects.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that’s a copy of target token you control.
{W}{U} Page 13
Whenever you attack, create a 1/1 black Skeleton creature token that’s tapped and attacking.
{U}{B} Page 47
{X}{U}{B}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard with mana value X: Create a token that’s a copy of the exiled card. Activate only as a sorcery.
